sourcesContent:
import React, { ReactText } from "react"
import { Flex, SimpleGrid } from "@chakra-ui/react"

import { Header, Sidebar } from "../../components"

export default function index({ children }) {
  return (
    <Flex direction="column">
      <Flex w="100%" mx="auto">
        <Flex px="6" my="6">
          <Sidebar />
        </Flex>

        <Flex w="100%" flex="1">
          <Header />
        </Flex>
      </Flex>
      <SimpleGrid gap="4" minChildWidth="320px" align="flex-start" bg="white">
        {children}
      </SimpleGrid>
    </Flex>
  )
}
